content.description: Real-time NCAAM College Basketball scores on ESPN
content.keywords: NCAAM Scores, NCAAM scoreboard, College Basketball Scores, College Basketball scoreboard

headlines.description: Gary Trent Jr. scored a season-high 30 points and No. 5-ranked Duke needed less than three minutes to erase a 13-point second-half deficit, scoring 18 consecutive points to overtake No. 25 Miami 83-75 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Trent's 30 helps No. 5 Duke rally past Miami 83-75

headlines.description: Svi Mykhailiuk scored 17 points, including 12 over the final seven minutes, and No. 10 Kansas roared back from a big deficit to beat No. 6 West Virginia 71-66 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mykhailiuk, Graham lead No. 10 Kansas over No. 6 WVU 71-66

video.headline: Mykhailiuk finger-rolls to get KU back in front

headlines.description: Muhammad-Ali Abdur-Rahkman made two free throws with 1.2 seconds left, lifting No. 23 Michigan to a 68-67 win over Maryland on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: No. 23 Michigan barely beats short-handed Maryland 68-67

headlines.description: Tanner Leissner had 26 points and 12 rebounds, Iba Camara added 17 boards and New Hampshire beat UMass Lowell 74-62 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Leissner leads New Hampshire past UMass Lowell 74-62

headlines.description: Brandon Tabb scored 18 points, Soufiyane Diakite had 10 points and 15 rebounds, and Bethune-Cookman beat cross-county rival Stetson 74-62 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bethune-Cookman beats cross-county rival Stetson 74-62

headlines.description: Loudon Love and Jaylon Hall each scored 16 points to help Wright State beat Youngstown State 77-67 on Monday night for its seventh straight victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wright State wins 7th straight, beats Youngstown State 77-67

headlines.description: Raasean Davis had 18 points and 11 rebounds, Pablo Rivas added 15 points and North Carolina Central beat Morgan State 77-63 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: NCCU tops Morgan State 77-63, wins 6th straight

headlines.description: Kyron Cartwright scored 16 of his 18 points in the second half to help Providence beat Butler 70-60 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Providence pulls away in 2nd half, beats Butler 70-60

headlines.description: Martaveous McKnight had 25 points and six assists, Charles Jackson made five 3-pointers and scored 17 points, and Arkansas-Pine Bluff beat Alcorn State 71-59 on Monday night for its fifth straight victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: McKnight, Arkansas-Pine Bluff beat Alcorn State 71-59

headlines.description: Jairus Lyles scored a season-high 35 points to help Maryland, Baltimore County beat Hartford 78-56 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lyles scores 35, UMBC beats Hartford 78-56

headlines.description: Justin Ravenel made eight 3-pointers and scored a career-high 30 points, Marcus Barham scored 11 of his 24 points in the two overtime sessions and Florida A&M beat Delaware State 94-89 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ravenel hits 8 3s, Florida A&M tops Delaware St 94-89 in 2OT

headlines.description: Ky Bowman scored 19 points and grabbed 13 rebounds, Jerome Robinson also had 19 points and Boston College beat Florida State 81-75 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bowman's 19 points, 13 rebounds leads BC past Florida State

headlines.description: Dupree McBrayer scored 14 of a career-high 24 points in the second half and overtime and Minnesota beat Penn State 95-84 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: McBrayer leads Minnesota over Penn State

headlines.description: Marc Gosselin scored 16 points, Mike Amius had 13 with 12 rebounds and Western Carolina turned back VMI 65-58 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Gosselin, Amius lift Western Carolina over VMI 65-58

headlines.description: Jordan Strawberry scored five of his 18 points in overtime, finished with six assists and took a charge in the closing seconds to help Mercer beat Chattanooga 75-71 in overtime on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Strawberry, Mercer slip past Chattanooga 75-71 in OT

headlines.description: Willie Rodriguez scored 20 points, J.C. Show had 11 points, six rebounds and five assists and Binghamton beat longtime SUNY rival Albany 79-66 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Binghamton ends 14-game series skid, tops SUNY rival Albany

headlines.description: Drew Urquhart scored a career-high 21 points on 8-for-12 shooting to lead Vermont to its seventh-straight victory with an 83-62 win over Maine on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vermont pulls away for 83-62 win over Maine

headlines.description: Zach Thomas had 17 points and 15 rebounds, Nana Foulland scored 13 and grabbed 11 boards and Bucknell beat Colgate 63-51 on Monday night for its fourth consecutive win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Thomas, Foulland lead Bucknell to 63-51 win over Colgate

headlines.description: Isaiah Walton scored 27 points, B.K. Ashe added 25 points and 11 rebounds, and Longwood beat Campbell 76-62 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Longwood beats Campbell 76-62

headlines.description: MaCio Teague scored 27 points, hitting five of UNC Asheville's 13 3-pointers , and the Bulldogs defeated Charleston Southern 83-73 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Teague scores 27, Asheville tops Charleston Southern 83-73

headlines.description: Xavier Cooks had 17 points, 14 rebounds and eight assists to lead Winthrop to a 90-67 win over Gardner-Webb on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Winthrop cruises to 90-67 win over Gardner-Webb

headlines.description: Junior Ricky Madison had his first career double-double and Brandon Kamga scored 13 points, including three 3-pointers, to help High Point beat Presbyterian 73-49 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Madison, Kamga lead High Point past Presbyterian 73-49

headlines.description: Ed Polite Jr. scored 18 and made all seven of his field-goal attempts, including the go-ahead dunk with 1:25 left in overtime, to help Radford beat Liberty 59-57 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Radford moves alone atop Big South with OT win over Liberty

headlines.description: Shyheld Petteway had 23 points and nine rebounds to lead Division II Elizabeth City State to a 76-67 win over Norfolk State on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Petteway scores 23, Elizabeth City dumps Norfolk 76-67

headlines.description: Mason Faulkner scored 16 points with 7-for-11 shooting and Northern Kentucky cruised to a 70-55 win over Cleveland State on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Northern Kentucky powers past Cleveland State 70-55

headlines.description: Davaris McGowens scored 13 points and Aaren Edmead added 10 to help North Carolina A&T beat Coppin State 60-47 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: McGowens, Edmead help NC A&T beat Coppin State 60-47

headlines.description: Damani Applewhite and Janai Rayner-Powell had 13 points each and South Carolina State beat Maryland-Eastern Shore 66-62 for its third straight win on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: South Carolina State rallies past Maryland-Eastern Shore

headlines.description: Kameron Hankerson came off the bench to score a career-high 24 points, including the tie-breaking 3-pointer with 38.7 seconds left in overtime, and Green Bay defeated Milwaukee 99-92 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hankerson scores 24, Green Bay tops Milwaukee 99-92 in OT

headlines.description: Kendrick Nunn had 18 of his 32 points in the first half and grabbed nine rebounds on Monday night to help Oakland beat Illinois-Chicago 78-68.
headlines.shortLinkText: Oakland pulls away late, beats UIC 78-68

headlines.description: Alante Fenner scored a career-high 27 points, including the winning bucket, and grabbed 10 rebounds to lift Savannah State to a 91-90 win over Howard on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fenner lifts Savannah State past Howard 91-90

headlines.description: Jason Perry-Murray scored 12 points with 12 rebounds, including a putback at the buzzer, lifting Grambling to a 79-78 win over Texas Southern on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Perry-Murray putback lifts Grambling over Texas Southern

headlines.description: Jared Sam scored nine of his 20 points in overtime, Emanuel Sheperd and Jamar Sandifer each had a double-double to help Southern beat Mississippi Valley State 77-70 in overtime on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southern beats Mississippi Valley State 78-70 in OT

headlines.description: Jeremiah Jefferson poured in nine 3-pointers and finished with 28 points, both career highs, to lead Jackson State to a 79-71 win over Prairie View A&M on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jefferson lifts Jackson State past Prairie View A&M 79-71

venue.fullName: Lee E. Williams Athletic and Assembly Center

headlines.description: James Palmer Jr. hit a 3-pointer just before the buzzer to give Nebraska a 64-63 win over Illinois on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Huskers beat Illini 64-63 on Palmer's last-second 3-pointer

video.headline: Nebraska edges Illinois in a thriller

headlines.description: Sam Hauser was 5 of 10 from 3-point range and scored 19 points on Monday night to help Marquette beat DePaul 70-52.
headlines.shortLinkText: Marquette drops cold-shooting DePaul 70-52

headlines.description: Manu Lecomte scored 25 of his career-high 30 points after halftime as Baylor avoided a rare three-game losing streak with a 76-60 victory over Oklahoma State on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Lecomte scores 30 in Baylor's 76-60 win over Oklahoma State

nowFeed.headline: USC junior forward Bennie Boatwright will miss the rest of the season after suffering a left patella injury during Thursday's win, per the school. Was averaging 13.6 points and 6.4 rebounds.
nowFeed.story: USC junior forward Bennie Boatwright will miss the rest of the season after suffering a left patella injury during Thursday's win, per the school. Was averaging 13.6 points and 6.4 rebounds.

nowFeed.headline: Back at @KUHoops Brings back a great memory thanks to a great group of players. @LBSUhoops https://t.co/aMhklA2Vbl
nowFeed.story: Back at @KUHoops Brings back a great memory thanks to a great group of players. @LBSUhoops vimeo.com/256137612

nowFeed.headline: Under Sean Miller Deandre Ayton is maximizing his enormous potential. Ayton has always possessed the physical tools and a solid basketball IQ. He has worked hard at Zona along with making the adjustments to college basketball. For a freshman big man it's really hard to dominate right away. Since he arrived in the states he was a top ranked player in his class. Would have been top 5 in last years NBA draft. Now he will be a top 3 pick and will be much more prepared.
nowFeed.story: Under Sean Miller Deandre Ayton is maximizing his enormous potential. Ayton has always possessed the physical tools and a solid basketball IQ. He has worked hard at Zona along with making the adjustments to college basketball. For a freshman big man it's really hard to dominate right away. Since he arrived in the states he was a top ranked player in his class. Would have been top 5 in last years NBA draft. Now he will be a top 3 pick and will be much more prepared.

nowFeed.headline:
The race for the No. 1 seeds is more wide open now after a few recent upsets. Per BPI, here's where we stand:

Virginia 99%
Villanova 98%
Purdue 71%
Michigan State 52%
Xavier 32%
Duke 29%
North Carolina 9%
Tennessee 4%
Auburn 3%
Kansas 2%

nowFeed.headline: Spending time with Jaylen Adams and Matt Mobley of St. Bonaventure before the 19-6 Bonnies, winners of 7 straight host Rhode Island. nowFeed.headline: Houston coach Kelvin Sampson said "good teams should win at home," including his Cougars, who are 13-0 this season at home, including Thursday's 67-62 upset of No. 5 Cincinnati.
nowFeed.story: Houston coach Kelvin Sampson said "good teams should win at home," including his Cougars, who are 13-0 this season at home, including Thursday's 67-62 upset of No. 5 Cincinnati.

nowFeed.headline: After losing 6 of the last 8 games, a surprise phone call from Big O was timely and uplifting for Trae Young. https://t.co/BKgoupMsR9
nowFeed.story: After losing 6 of the last 8 games, a surprise phone call from Big O was timely and uplifting for Trae Young. pic.twitter.com/BKgoupMsR9

nowFeed.headline: Cincinnati shot just 6-for-19 (31.6%) in the second half vs. Houston, including a FG drought of nearly 12 minutes down the stretch. The Bearcats got out rebounded 36-27. Both of those bit them tonight.
nowFeed.story: Cincinnati shot just 6-for-19 (31.6%) in the second half vs. Houston, including a FG drought of nearly 12 minutes down the stretch. The Bearcats got out rebounded 36-27. Both of those bit them tonight.

nowFeed.headline: Cincinnati's loss at Houston will likely drop them from the No. 2-seed line in Joe Lunardi's Bracketology, with Texas Tech likely being the beneficiary to move up. The Cougars, who were a 10-seed coming into the night, scored another big resume win after picking one up over Wichita State in January.
nowFeed.story: Cincinnati's loss at Houston will likely drop them from the No. 2-seed line in Joe Lunardi's Bracketology, with Texas Tech likely being the beneficiary to move up. The Cougars, who were a 10-seed coming into the night, scored another big resume win after picking one up over Wichita State in January.

nowFeed.headline: Houston upsets No. 5 Cincinnati 67-62, ending the Bearcats nation-leading 16-game winning streak. It's the first time the Cougars have beaten two top-10 opponents in a season since 1984.
nowFeed.story: Houston upsets No. 5 Cincinnati 67-62, ending the Bearcats nation-leading 16-game winning streak. It's the first time the Cougars have beaten two top-10 opponents in a season since 1984.

nowFeed.headline: Ironically, Cincinnati's loss to Houston also finally gives Cincinnati its first win over a likely NCAA Tournament team.
nowFeed.story: Ironically, Cincinnati's loss to Houston also finally gives Cincinnati its first win over a likely NCAA Tournament team.

nowFeed.headline: Cincinnati getting it done at the foul line tonight, hitting 17-of-21 free throw attempts. The Bearcats are hanging on to a 50-49 lead over Houston with 4:10 left.
nowFeed.story: Cincinnati getting it done at the foul line tonight, hitting 17-of-21 free throw attempts. The Bearcats are hanging on to a 50-49 lead over Houston with 4:10 left.
